텍스트: "The icy wind swept across the desolate mountains, piercing me with its chilling breath."
프롬프트: "Haunting ambient soundscape with cold wind gusts and distant howls."
"Orchestral strings rising and falling like the storm, evoking despair."
"Minimalist piano with echoing notes, evoking isolation in a frozen land."

텍스트: "I beheld the wretch — the miserable monster whom I had created."
프롬프트: "Dark cinematic score with tense drones and sudden sharp tones."
"Heavy percussion and low brass, conveying dread and confrontation."
"Distorted electronic textures suggesting horror and shock."

텍스트: "The candle was nearly burnt out when, by the glimmer of the half-extinguished light, I saw the dull yellow eye of the creature open."
프롬프트: "Slow suspenseful build-up with eerie strings and faint whispers."
"Horror soundscape with flickering crackles and heartbeat-like pulses."
"Quiet ambient tones with sudden sharp violin screech for shock."

텍스트: "The castle is on the very edge of a terrible precipice, with only a narrow roadway leading to its gates."
프롬프트: "Gothic orchestral score with deep organ chords and looming tension."
"Dark ambient with wind whistling through stone halls."
"Suspenseful cinematic soundtrack with slow percussion and echo."

텍스트: "There are dark, rolling clouds overhead, and in the valleys below a mist creeps along the ground."
프롬프트: "Haunting soundscape with thunder rumbles and low drones."
"Mystical ambient with layered choirs and distant bells."
"Minimal synth textures with subtle dissonance, evoking unease."

텍스트: “There are mysteries which men can only guess at, which age by age they may solve only in part.”
프롬프트: "Philosophical, reflective piano theme with soft reverb."
"Somber strings with a slow, questioning melody."
"Ambient soundscape with spoken-word echoes, mystical tone."

텍스트: “It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.”
프롬프트: "Light, witty orchestral music with playful strings and harpsichord."
"Cheerful piano theme with subtle irony, evoking polite society."
"Elegant chamber ensemble with a humorous undertone."

텍스트: “I could easily forgive his pride, if he had not mortified mine.”
프롬프트: "Gentle solo piano with a bittersweet, reflective melody."
"Soft strings with rising tension, expressing wounded pride."
"Minimalist harp and flute, evoking irony and hurt feelings."

텍스트: “You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you.”
프롬프트: "Romantic string quartet swelling with passion."
"Tender piano and violin duet, expressing sincerity."
"Gentle orchestral theme with a dramatic emotional climax."

텍스트: “My father’s family name being Pirrip, and my Christian name Philip, my infant tongue could make of both names nothing longer or more explicit than Pip.”
프롬프트: "Warm orchestral theme with nostalgic overtones."
"Gentle woodwinds and harp, evoking childhood innocence."
"Lighthearted piano melody, suggesting memory and beginnings."

텍스트: “A fearful man, all in coarse gray, with a great iron on his leg.”
프롬프트: "Dark, ominous strings with deep percussion."
"Tense ambient soundscape with metallic clanging echoes."
"Low brass and cello tones, conveying menace and fear."

텍스트: “The marshes were just a long black horizontal line then, as I stopped to look after him.”
프롬프트: "Sparse ambient tones with distant wind and low drones."
"Somber orchestral theme with muted strings."
"Minimal electronic textures with echoing footsteps in fog."

텍스트: “Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.”
프롬프트: "Passionate orchestral swell with violins and harp, evoking eternal love."
"Gentle piano duet with layered harmonies, expressing unity."
"Ambient ethereal pads with soft echoes, suggesting soul connection."

텍스트: “I cannot live without my soul.”
프롬프트: "Dark cello and piano theme, filled with longing and despair."
"Slow, haunting choir tones with deep resonance."
"Minimal electronic hum with pulsating low notes, evoking emptiness."

텍스트: “I gave him my heart, and he took and pinched it to death; and flung it back to me.”
프롬프트: "Harsh percussive sounds with dissonant strings, evoking violence."

"Dark ambient with heartbeat-like pulses fading into silence."

텍스트: “The only way to get rid of a temptation is to yield to it.”

"Philosophical ambient textures with shifting tonalities."

텍스트: “Behind every exquisite thing that existed, there was something tragic.”
프롬프트: "Melancholic string quartet with a delicate but sad melody."
"Ambient piano with reverb, soft descending scales."
"Ethereal synth soundscape with faint distorted undertones."

텍스트: “The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame.”

텍스트: “I seemed to see a long grey waste, and here and there a hill or a house slipping like mist.”

텍스트: “The Time Machine swayed, and I found myself hurled through space and time.”

텍스트: “The darkness seemed to press upon my eyes, and the silence was so intense that it made my ears ache.”

텍스트: “Fifteen men on the dead man’s chest—Yo-ho-ho, and a bottle of rum!”

텍스트: “Seaward ho! Hang the treasure! It’s the glory of the sea that’s calling us.”

"Energetic cinematic soundtrack with bright brass and waves sound effects."

텍스트: “The sea, the sullen sea, lay vast and dark before us, heaving slowly like a sleeping beast.”

"Slow percussion with rumbling bass, like the heartbeat of the ocean."
